title: Dermot Whelan's Power Hour in Cork
summary: Join us in the Cork office or online on February 11, where we'll be joined by Dermot for a one-hour session focused on science-backed techniques to bust stress, build resilience, and feel more focused.

children.text: Need something to look forward to once January's out of the way? We've got you. ðŸ‘€

Dermot swaps the jokes for simple, science-backed techniques to bust stress, build resilience, and feel more focusedâ€”don't worry, there'll definitely still be a few laughs along the way.
